body_html: FYI (unrelated to this PR), test_cdf_icdf_inverse fails for one of the Pareto distributions in EXAMPLES. This doesn't happen always but when actual or samples contain inf which results into nan in rel_error and fails assertLess.
body_text: FYI (unrelated to this PR), test_cdf_icdf_inverse fails for one of the Pareto distributions in EXAMPLES. This doesn't happen always but when actual or samples contain inf which results into nan in rel_error and fails assertLess.
body: FYI (unrelated to this PR), [`test_cdf_icdf_inverse`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_distributions.py#L1509-L1526) fails for one of the `Pareto` distributions in `EXAMPLES`. This doesn't happen always but when `actual` or `samples` contain `inf` which results into `nan` in `rel_error` and fails `assertLess`.
